item.title: The Scene’s new app helps New Yorkers find dining and nightlife spots
item.description:
Choosing between New York City’s nearly 25,000 restaurants can be overwhelming. The pressure is especially high when you’re trying to impress a first date (or investor) or entertain family from out of town. A new app launched over the weekend to address precisely that. iOS-only “pocket concierge service,” The Scene, uses machine learning to match […]

item.description:

item.title: Verizon hit by prepaid subscriber exodus after internet subsidy ends
CrowdStrike shares hit again as IT disruption continues
Most airlines except one are recovering from the CrowdStrike tech outage. The feds have noticed
Get $20 off the Amazon Fire TV Soundbar with this post-Prime Day deal
item.description: Amazon's Fire TV Soundbar is down 17% to $99.99 from a list price of $119.99, making for a sweet deal on this speaker post-Prime Day.

item.title: Amazon deal of the day: Get the AirPods Max for even cheaper than Prime Day
item.description: Amazon's best deals of the day on July 22 include the AirPods Max, Dash Tasti-Crisp air fryer, Hisense 65-inch TV, Tile Mate 2-pack, and HP printer.
